Test Name: Alpha-Fetoprotein (AFP) Single Marker Screen, Maternal, Serum
Purpose: To measure and report alpha-fetoprotein levels in maternal serum for prenatal screening and assessment.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer capable of AFP analysis (e.g., Beckman Coulter, Siemens, Roche), centrifuge, pipettes
